description:
Guests travelling with children must inform the property in advance how many will be staying and of their ages upon booking. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

When booking 10 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

extra_lines.imp_info: This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties. If you require an invoice when booking a prepaid rate, please write this request and your company details in the Ask a question box. Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Please inform Riu Plaza Berlin in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation. Parking is subject to availability due to limited spaces.
